fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.appliances

Interface Heater

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.environment.Namable, fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.electricalGrid.Prosumer, fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.temperature.ThermicObject, fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.electricalGrid.TunableProsumer, fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.temperature.Wall
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HeaterImpl

    public interface Heater
extends fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.temperature.Wall, fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.temperature.ThermicObject, fr.sylfrey.misTiGriD.electricalGrid.TunableProsumer
    Describes a heater, that is, a ThermicObject which temperature is determined by tuning its electrical consumption (cf. TunableProsumer) and that influences its thermic neighbours (cf. Wall).
    Author:
    syl

    • Method Detail

      • getEmissionPower

        float getEmissionPower()
        Returns:
        the electrical power currently consumed by this Heater, in Watts. How this power is converted into temperature is a matter of implementation and efficiency.

      • getMaxEmissionPower

        float getMaxEmissionPower()
        Returns:
        the maximum this Heater can consume (and therefore heat).

      • setEmissionPower

        void setEmissionPower(float power)
        Parameters:
        power: - how much this Heater consumes, in Watts.
